translations: 罗马帝国的加强界线（limes 的复数）

sentences.sentence: I must not waste one minute, or even one second. I must challenge my limites and then surpass them.
sentences.translation: 在今天的每一分每一秒，全力以赴，挑战极限，超越自我。

sentences.sentence: The only real limitation on your abilities is the level of your desires. If you want it badly enough, there are no limites on what you can achieve.
sentences.translation: 你能力的唯一上限就是你的渴望程度。如果你足够想要，你的成就没有上限。
